summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeMorphe's retractable Micro Brow Dual-Ended Pencil & Spoolie is a double-ended mechanical pencil that fills, defines, and shapes your brows with zero tugging.
details: DetailsFeaturesFills, shapes & definesRetractableHard-wax formulaResearch Results97% agreed pencil provides natural, hairlike strokes & precision detailing*97% agreed pencil is longwearing*97% agreed pencil is easy to use & buildable**Based on a U.S. consumer perception study of 34 consumersItem 2578274How To UseJust The Tip: Use short, upward strokes to fill in your brows. Need some shape? Using the spoolie end, brush brow hair up and draw thin line along natural hairline. Brush brow hair down and do the same on top. Then fill in the details.To create natural-looking brows, use two colors. Select a color one shade lighter than your hair color to fill in the first 1/4 inch of your brow. Finish off rest of brow with a shade that matches your hair color.IngredientsCold Brew: Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba, Cire De Carnauba), Beeswax (Cera Alba, Cire D'Abeille), C10-18 Triglycerides, Stearic Acid, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire microcristalline), Silica, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, BHT. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77489, CI 77491, CI 77492).
how_to_use: Just The Tip: Use short, upward strokes to fill in your brows. Need some shape? Using the spoolie end, brush brow hair up and draw thin line along natural hairline. Brush brow hair down and do the same on top. Then fill in the details.To create natural-looking brows, use two colors. Select a color one shade lighter than your hair color to fill in the first 1/4 inch of your brow. Finish off rest of brow with a shade that matches your hair color.
ingredients: Cold Brew: Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax

reviews.headline: Back to the lab!
reviews.comments: I know I placed a good amount of Pro's but the reason I can't place it 4-5 stars is because the packaging is bad. The compact is terrible. It does break easily after a couple tries but the most frustrating part is that the entire pencil comes out!! I came out multiple times if I turned it upside down. Before you say "Well don't turn it upside down" even if i titled it slighty the entire pencil falls. Compact and packing is terrible! Back to the lab!

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy it again
reviews.comments: I have been using this eyebrow pencil for years and I love the quality and look it gives

reviews.headline: good form factor, perfect color, texture is too soft
reviews.comments: Would have given this five stars but I wish the texture was a little harder/more waxy. It's way too soft and too easy to apply too much and it's impossible to get fine hair like strokes out of this. Having the spoolie on one end does help to blend it out but it's hard to be precise because this pencil just smears. It also feels like either it retracts a lot when I use it or I'm using it up that fast. The color is a perfect cool dark tone that is great on black/brown brows. I don't need much but this would be great if you need to draw on brows.

reviews.headline: Need to move on
reviews.comments: This is my favorite eyebrow pencil ever but the price constantly increasing is getting ridiculous! Started using this when it was $5 and I could buy at least 4 at a time.

reviews.headline: Love it !
reviews.comments: Love it !! Works great shaping eyebrows. Very thin tip which is nice to fill small areas of the eyebrows

reviews.headline: The only brow pencil I buy.
reviews.comments: I love the color of this brow stick. I've tried many and this is the only one that is a perfect match for my blonde hair.

reviews.headline: Eye Pencil
reviews.comments: The tip kept breaking off.

reviews.headline: Don't Press Too Hard, It Breaks
reviews.comments: It gives a fine line and let's you fill in sparse  brows discreetly, but the pencil breaks off if you press too hard. Maybe warming it with your hands or fingers at the tip would soften it to glide on more easily without pressing harder at first, but the breakage wastes a lot of pencil and it doesn't last as long.

reviews.headline: Perfect liner
reviews.comments: Liner goes on well and stays all day. Beautiful. Colors

reviews.headline: This is the only brow pencil I use
reviews.comments: This is one of the best brow pencils on the market I also use the definer one with it ‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

reviews.headline: LOVE!
reviews.comments: I was a did hard ABH brow wiz user but I decided to make the switch to something equally as good and affordable. THIS IS IT! Its amazing, creamy, glides on easily, and pigmented. It reminds me of their lip liners honestly. I really love how its buildable without being harsh!

reviews.headline: Itchy!?
reviews.comments: It came out food but my eyebrows would he come itchy??

reviews.headline: I liked it, but it's a Waste
reviews.comments: The product is good, but I do not like products that will only last 3 weeks of regular use. I wear makeup 5 days a week, and I took a one week break since buying this product. I needed a new one one month later. Not a good value and so wasteful. So much plastic for 3 weeks worth of product. The hunt for the perfect eyebrow product continues.
Great product, it's helpful for shading and shaping brows
Great product, it's helpful for shading and shaping your brows

reviews.headline: Perfect brow pencil
reviews.comments: The eyebrow pencil is perfect size and color for me. At my age the eyebrows get thinner and thinner. This pencil is light to use when making tiny swipes and fills those areas wonderfully.

reviews.headline: This is my favorite eyebrow pencil!!
reviews.comments: I'm really picky when it comes to my eyebrow pencils and color. The skinny tip makes it easier for me to do my eyebrows.

reviews.headline: was once a holy grail
reviews.comments: This pencil was $5 and then slowly increased as the years passed, but compared to other pencils in its price range I feel the quality isn't as good. Overall it works fine and is a great micro pencil if options from Nyx are not available to you!

reviews.headline: Morphe brow pencil
reviews.comments: Ive never had a color accurate enough to like foing my brows but yhis matches my brown brows so well!!!!

reviews.headline: I Would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I love it

faceoff_positive.comments: I've worked long and hard  both at deciding what brow shape looked best on me and perfecting it. I like to research reviews when it comes to the beauty and skincare industry ‚Ä¶..while I've used Morphe plenty of times  I've never used their eye pencil.  Through trial and error I fell in  love with a drugstore brand and I've been using it for 3 years.  I had no problem with this product  I loved it‚Ä¶.   So   on a whim  whilst killing time before a movie  I was giving myself a mini makeover at Ulta  when I tried on Morphe's micro eyebrow pencil in Chocolate Mousse.  The  thing that drew me to the display was the color options you all offer for eyebrows.  That's something you don't see with the drugstore brands. Anyway  my eyebrows had never looked so natural  the color was just right. I have black hair  so I use black eye pencil  because the  dark brown option was too light.  This Morphe shade  the precision of the pencil  and the brands reputation were all factors when I decided this would be my new eyebrow pencil‚Ä¶Unfortunately  like with all great products  the masses beat me too it  they were sold out of my color ‚Ä¶.   As soon as I got home I ordered  a few of them from your website  I can't wait to receive it. Oh yes and it's reasonably priced  I'd  have no problem paying double for this brand and these results.  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: The Best Eyebrow Pencil On The Market!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was really excited to receive this eyebrow pencil because of the stellar reviews, unfortunately, there is no way any of the colors were made for my black hair.

I usually use a gray pencil since I don't want super dark brows so Chocolate Mousse (soft black with neutral undertones) seemed to be the best bet except EH, WRONG. This is brown. There is no ifs, ands or buts about it. BROWN. I'm so disappointed since I thought it would be the perfect eyebrow pencil. I do like the formula for creating more realistic feathery brows but it's so clearly the wrong color for black hair that there's really no using it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Chocolate Mousse is not any sort of black
